Problem.text: Give 2 arguments for the hypothesis that J.B. has cystic fibrosis (has 2 mutated copies of the CFTR gene).

HypothesisGiven.text: J.B.'s father is a carrier of the CFTR gene mutation (has one normal copy and one mutated copy of the CFTR gene).

Generalization.text: Although cystic fibrosis classically manifests in early childhood, approximately 4 percent of patients are diagnosed in adulthood.

Data.text: Test result: J.B.'s chloride level is 75 mmol/L.
